All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Bytes
    Utilities to work with bytes.
    BytesTest
    Tests for the Byte utilities.
    Datagram
    Utilities to work with Datagram(Packet)s.
    DatagramTest
    Tests for the Datagram utilities.
    DownloadHelper
    DownloadHelper to download a file
    EmptyResponseException
    Exception to indicate response from remote was empty/null.
    ExitProgram
    Exception indicating that programs has to be exited.
    FileOperations
    Utilities to work with Files.
    FileOperationsTest  
    FileTransferClient
    Client to interact with FileTransfer server.
    FileTransferClientHandler  
    FileTransferProtocol
    Protocol for NU-5 File Transfer (final assignment module 2).
    FileTransferServer
    Server to interact with FileTransfer clients, and start new clientHandlers.
    Helper
    Interface of a Helper class.
    ITimeoutEventHandler
    Interface for timeout event handlers.
    NetworkLayer
    This class provides network layer functionalities.
    NoMatchingFileException
    Exception to indicate no matching file was found on the remote.
    NotEnoughFreeSpaceException
    Exception to indicate there is not enough disk space.
    Packet
    Model of a Packet, (as extension of a DatagramPacket, which is a final class).
    PacketException
    Exception to indicate a protocol violation.
    ProtocolException
    Exception to indicate a protocol violation.
    ServerFailureException
    Exception to indicate server has failed.
    TimeOut
    Helper class for setting timeouts.
    TimeOutTest  
    TransportLayer
    This class provides transport layer functionalities.
    TUI
    General TUI for the FileTransfer server and client.
    TUICommands
    All commands used in a TUI for the FileTranfer client and server.
    UploadHelper
    UploadHelper to upload a file.
    UtilByteException
    Exception to indicate problems using Byte utilities.
    UtilDatagramException
    Exception to indicate problems using Datagram utilities.
